titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to take away the power of the Committee on Rules to report rules or orders waiving the germaneness requirement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 8/1/1996--Introduced. Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the Committee on Rules from reporting any rule or order waiving the prohibition against considering nongermane amendments.
